name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-workers
description: utils for creating thumbnails and index used by the TagSpaces application
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.node-install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm install && npm dedupe
scripts.node-install-new: npx rimraf package-lock.json && npx rimraf node_modules && npm install && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm run-script --prefix ./node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms install && npm dedupe
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run node-install-new && npm publish --access public
